popt4jlib

Interface ObserverIntf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlternatingVariablesDescent, ArmijoSteepestDescentST, DFA, DGA, DPSO, FletcherConjugateGradientST, PolakRibiereConjugateGradientST

    public interface ObserverIntf
    This interface allows objects that want to be "monitoring" other "Subject" objects to be notified whenever a change in the subject occurs, and act accordingly. The Observer is free to modify the Subject's state. One use of the mechanism is to allow a GA process to notify another optimizer (e.g. a Gradient-Descent based optimizer) whenever a new incumbent has been found. The combination of the ObserverIntf and the SubjectIntf is the well-known Observer Design Pattern.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
